name: pressure

effect.sword-shield: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.
effect.the-isle-of-armor: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.
effect.the-crown-tundra: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.
effect.brilliant-diamond-and-shining-pearl: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.
effect.legends-arceus: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.

short_effect: Increases the PP cost of moves targetting the Pokémon by one.

flavor_text.sword-shield: By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it raises their PP usage.
